Class StudentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • StudentDAO

  • public class StudentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods that access the database and manipulate the student data in some way (CRUD).
    Author:
    Joshua McEwen (16012396)

      Checks the API token supplied as a URL parameter and returns a boolean based on the outcome of that check.

      Updates a student record into the database from a supplied Student object, using the supplied student number to identify existing record.

        public static boolean updateStudent(Student student)
        Updates a student record into the database from a supplied Student object, using the supplied student number to identify existing record.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the update.

      • checkLoginCredentials

        public static boolean checkLoginCredentials(java.lang.String username,
                                            java.lang.String password)
        Checks for a user record with the supplied username and password, returning a boolean based on the outcome. Used to validate a user as having correct credentials for access.
        Parameters:
        username - User's username
        password - User's password in plain text
        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the retrieval.

      • checkUserExists

        public static boolean checkUserExists(java.lang.String username)
        Checks for an existing user. Usage for registration and preventing duplicate account names.
        Parameters:
        username - Candidate username
        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the retrieval.

      • insertUser

        public static boolean insertUser(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password)
        Inserts a new user record into the Users table with a hashed password and randomly generated API token.
        Parameters:
        username - Candidate username
        password - Candidate password
        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the insertion.

      • getApiKey

        public static java.lang.String getApiKey(java.lang.String username)
        Returns the API token from the database for the supplied username.
        Parameters:
        username - User's username
        Returns:
        API token

      • checkApiKey

        public static boolean checkApiKey(java.lang.String token)
        Checks the database against the supplied API token for a match. Returns a boolean based on the outcome. Used for validating genuine requests.
        Parameters:
        token - User's API token
        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the retrieval.

      • isValidToken

        public static boolean isValidToken(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange exch)
        Checks the API token supplied as a URL parameter and returns a boolean based on the outcome of that check.
        Parameters:
        exch - HttpExchange object to access request details
        Returns:
        true/false depending on whether the token exists or not.
